General.Name: Shanghai Dragon Corp
General.Description: Shanghai Dragon Corporation operates in textile industry in China. The company engages in the knitting, home textile, apparel, international trade, e-commerce, and brand management businesses. It also offers knitted underwear, household series, leisure series, underwear, bras, and socks; home textile products, including bed sheets, quilt covers, pillowcases, back covers, quilt cores, blankets, towels, etc.; apparel products, such as shirts, casual pants, t-shirts, sweaters, jackets, down jackets, coats, etc. The company sells its products through self-operated specialty stores, department stores/supermarket counters, and other channels, as well as e-commerce channels, such as tmall, jd.com, vipshop, and dongfang shopping. Shanghai Dragon Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
